title: Well GD I haven't heard back from any of the itnernships I applied to
body:
I am bummed out as fuck.

Not even joking, I needed these internships and WANTED them as well beacuse it'd be fun as fuck. Not only that but I need money to fix shit and help my family get through tough as fuck times... (a lot of health issues going around).

I just want to break down and cry. I needed this so fucking bad.
